page.title: 16BROADCLYST CHURCH
page.content: The{church}was built in the early 15th century.It is{485}years old,soon it will be{500}years old.It is a {mediaeval}church.It has never been rebuilt because it has never had a fire etc.There are no ghost stories or anything.Before it was built there probably was a{Norman church}on the site.There has been exactly{37}vicars serving in the {church.}It has got 132 steps up the tower.{Helen Johns.} {BLOODSPORTS.}Bloodsport is a sport with animals involved. Bloodsport is a cruel sport and you kill animals, probably chasing after them with dogs or shooting them. If you kill animals for food it is not a bloodsport. Deep sea fishing is not a bloodsport because it is for food.Killing animals for their skin or tusks is a blood- sport because it is not necessary. *{BEN CHING}*
